recipe_text: Quantity; 454; Prepare 454 grams of ground beef| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of water| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of tomato sauce| Measurement; 400; Measure out 400 grams of kidney beans| Measurement; 400; Measure out 400 grams of pinto beans| Quantity; 1; Prepare 1 onion, chopped| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of chili powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of garlic powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of hot pepper sauce| Untimed; None; Brown the ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat| Untimed; None; Drain excess fat from the skillet| Untimed; None; Add chopped onion to the skillet and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Stir in chili powder, salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and hot pepper sauce| Untimed; None; Add tomato sauce and water to the skillet| Untimed; None; Stir in kidney beans and pinto beans| Timed; 1200; Simmer the chili for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Quick Chili II
